title.rendered: Vodafone Yu increases 5 GB for free in one of its rates

content.rendered:
Vodafone Yu It is the company’s youth subsidiary that offers a series of special conditions associated with the type of youth consumption and at lower prices than traditional operators. Now, with an increase in gigabytes in one of its rates, it further improves its value for money.

Specifically, we talk about the Big Yuser feewhich will have a new name and improve its data bonus conditions.

Increase of gigabytes in Vodafone Yu

Vodafone is starting to send text messages to its Yu customers reporting a next rate name change with new conditions.

Vodafone Yu 5 gigs free data

VF Info: We inform you that as of 06/15 the name of your Big Yuser rate will be called Big Yuser Classic and we will increase the GB of your mobile rate: you will go from 15 GB to 20 GB/month for the same price and without have to do anything. You will see the new data reflected in the My Vodafone App as of 07/01 here: m.vodafone.es/new-yuser.

This gift of an extra 5 GB at a Yu fee is not something new. Last year they added 5 GB extra without price increase to those customers who had the Heavy Yuser rate. Now the reason seems somewhat different, since new rates could be added and others adapted in a new portfolio that should be announced shortly.

New Classic Big Yuser fare

As we said, this increase in gigabytes corresponds to a variation in the denominations of tariffs that will take place on July 1, which suggests that in addition to the change from Big Yuser to classic Big Yuser, a new batch of tariffs could reach Vodafone Yu .

Vodafone Yu

If we add the 5 GB of extra data each month to the current Big Yuser conditions, we would have a Classic Big Yuser result like this:

  • Unlimited gigabytes in RRSS and messaging. Social and Chat Pass so you can enjoy your social network and messaging apps to the fullest without spending data on your rate.
  • Mobile rate 20 GB of cumulative data. You accumulate the gigabytes that you do not consume up to the maximum of triple your rate, that is, up to 60 GB, and within a maximum period of 3 months.
  • Unlimited calls to mobiles and landlines. Call setup included. Special rate services excluded.
  • SMS included up to a maximum of 1500 SMS/month. Once the bonus of 1,500 SMS has been exhausted, the price of national SMS is 12 cents.
  • Roaming included in the United States, any country in the European Union, the United Kingdom, Iceland, Norway, Liechtenstein, Switzerland, Turkey, the Vatican, Kosovo and Monaco.

This fee is priced at 15 euros per month and, as it has been reported that the upload of gigabytes will be free, that will continue to cost from June 15, 2022. It has no permanence.
